recipesJson.name: (RAP)ple
recipesJson.author: Tw8sted_Alien
recipesJson.description:
* optional 4-5 drops citric acid (10%) per 30 ml (approximately .25%)

A delicious juicy Raspberry Apple Peach flavor. First iteration. 

* if you find your getting too much of the vegetal note from the cactus feel free to drop it down to .25% I personally find after an overnight steep it adds a nice layer of clompexity to an otherwise simple recipe.

reviews.text: I just finished a 10ml tester of this stuff and it's pretty damn tasty
